body:
I like cards as Mirrorworks or Rite of Replication, which copy existing artifacts and/or creatures. Now, if you got some copies lying on the battlefield, it's easy to lose track of which of them are originals and which of them are tokens. 

A tiny small indicator, like, a white dot with a black T in it, would very helpful.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: token indicator on copied cards

comments.body: additional, there are cards that turn any permanent into artifacts. An indicator for that, like, a white dot with a black A in it, would be nice, too
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

comments.body:
An indicator for token copies of permanents would make sense and shouldn't be too tricky it implement.

There are also cards that can change a cards: color, type, subtype, card text.

Personally I would prefer these changes to be displayed by different card frames. Only requiring cropped images to be downloaded, as the oracle text and card frames are built in-game.

I'll get there at some point.

I'm not sure if text mode gives an indicator for tokens - I do know it sometimes has extra information.

**Status:** Accepted
